message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $1,900,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price given the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the market value, however,  the value of this product to me is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000.  I believe this reflects a fair compromise.
I understand that the product has value to you, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,550,000. This is my final offer.
